channel.title: Server base with combat
channel.description:
[b]Information[/b] Following my development thread (http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,371093.0.html) I posted today I have made some more updates on this server. I am releasing to the public for you to make a better server for yourself and learn Java Conventions unlike most of the WinterLove servers.
I'm really encouragin members to use this server or a server simular to this, you willget a lot of programming experiance by working this Java Conventions ect.
[b]Download link[/b] http://fileuploader.info/download.php?id=389F476F1
[b]Credits[/b] wL - For making the first private server Moparisthebest - For this forum and his 317 deob. Me - For creating this server. Anthony - For some basic Runefusion stuff.

item.title: Server base with combat
item.dc:creator: @new_IoSession new IoSession();
item.description:
@new_IoSession wrote:

Efilite:

I did take a few thins from Runefusion I admit, but this sorce was created by me.

No it was not you fool. Still trying to claim shit? Emily, You don’t know shit.

Read full topic

item.title: Server base with combat
item.dc:creator: @Efilite Efilite
item.description:
@Efilite wrote:

I did take a few thins from Runefusion I admit, but this sorce was created by me.

Read full topic

item.title: Server base with combat
item.dc:creator: @Graham Graham
item.description:
@Graham wrote:

This is RuneFusion with a few modifications. I know, as I was also on the RuneFusion team (along with Samurai and Nour as well as Blake). I suggest you give the appropriate credits.

EDIT:

primadude:

Good job. The ‘runserver’ batch file has it’s directory set to bin.net.runefusion.core.main, when it should be bin.net.project.core.main.

Noticed there is more proof there. As I’ve said, please at least give credit to the appropriate authors isntead of attempting to pass it off as your own work.

From the other thread:

Project (Unknown) - Daily Updates - Suggestions - New server base - Download

The server has log in and log off feature, there is no player rendering yet but I am looking into that as I’m posting this thread. I am in need of suggestions for this server, a server name is also required.

Yeah right. RuneFusion already had rendering and a basic (and crap) combat system.

Also: FYI you make it seem different than Winterlove’s server. Well, for your information, RuneFusion is based on Winterlove’s server lol! (Although with various modifications such as the packaging, non-thread-per-client fix, socketbuilder etc).

Read full topic

Following my development thread (http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,371093.0.html) I posted today I have made some more updates on this server.
I am releasing to the public for you to make a better server for yourself and learn Java Conventions unlike most of the WinterLove servers.
